p: Food safety is closely related to public health, a topic that has gained increasing attention. According to current knowledge, ingesting food contaminated by pathogenic microorganisms, such as Staphylococcus aureus and Escherichia coli, may increase health risks. To prevent food from being contaminated by microorganisms, chemosynthetic preservatives are prevalent in the food industry [ 1]. However, as consumers have become more aware of food safety issues, the demand for food free of chemical preservatives has gradually grown. Therefore, the development of a natural and safe antimicrobial agent has become more important.
